# Welcome {.unnumbered}

```{r}
#| label: setup
#| include: false

library(badger)
library(here)

source(here("R", "_setup.R"))
```

This book represents an collection of data reports related to the study: *Does Sleep Regularity Worsen Over the Third Trimester of Pregnancy?*.

All analyses presented in this document are fully reproducible and were conducted using the [Quarto](https://quarto.org/) publishing system and the [R](https://www.r-project.org/) programming language. Click [here](https://github.com/aliciarvilefortsales/sleep-in-pregnancy) or on the GitHub icon in the menu to explore the code. The research compendium is also accessible by clicking [here](https://doi.org/10.17605/OSF.IO/S4TBZ) via [The Open Science Framework](https://osf.io/).
